item.title: Dependency Injection VS Extract and Override Factory Method
item.description: The TextConverter exercise (in the Racing Car kata suite) is a very interesting exercise for refactoring legacy code. As I am reading Working Effectively with Legacy Code I found two ways of solving it. Refactoring can only be done safely with unit tests and so I did, rigourously in TDD. Though, in this blog post I am not going to show you all the testing process, but only the two ways of decoupling the dependency.
